# choices()

**Instance Method**

Returns an array of strings that represent the items available in the list or pop-up menu of the choice widget annotation.

## Declaration

```swift
func choices() -> [Any]!
```

## Return Value

An array of strings that represent the items in the list or pop-up menu choice widget annotation.

## Accessing the Items in the Choice Widget Annotation

- **setChoices(_:)**: Sets the items available in the list or pop-up menu of the choice widget annotation.

items.description: Sets the items available in the list or pop-up menu of the choice widget annotation.
items.name: setChoices(_:)
